import React from 'react' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Navigate, NavLink, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' function Register() { const [Values, setValues] = useState({ username: "", email: "", password: "" }) const navigate = useNavigate() const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/register", Values) .then(e => { console.log(e.data) if (e.data.Status == "Success") { navigate('/login') } else alert('Error') }).catch(ee => console.log("Error", ee)) } return (

Register Here

setValues({ ...Values, username: e.target.value })} type="text" className="form-control" aria-describedby="emailHelp" placeholder="Enter name" />
setValues({ ...Values, email: e.target.value })} className="form-control" id="exampleInputPassword1" placeholder="email" />
setValues({ ...Values, password: e.target.value })} className="form-control" id="exampleInputPassword1" placeholder="Password" />
Alerady User ?Login Here
) } export default Register
